domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

text: @pulte I have been Immune Comprised for the past 10 years from a very serious case of Pneumonia.  I was in Coma on a Respirator for 11 day and a Miracle pulled me through.  But since then, I’ve had a bowel obstruction causing me to lose 100 pounds and need a feeding tube for nutrition.
